featuredTile.title: Alceon AI Survey
featuredTile.subtitle: We need your input!
featuredTile.description: Just 3 minutes to complete. Totally anonymous. Your responses directly shape what we build, fix, and focus on in 2026.

capabilities.title: Not Sure Where to Start?
capabilities.subtitle: I'll help you find the right tool
capabilities.description: Tell me what you're trying to do and I'll guide you

action.prompt: I'm not sure where to start. I need help with:

capabilities.helpText: Perfect for when you're not sure which tool to use. Just describe what you need!
examples: I need to prepare for a meeting
I want to analyze some data

capabilities.title: General Chat
capabilities.subtitle: Ask anything
capabilities.description: Have a conversation with AI on any topic
capabilities.helpText: Your go-to for any question or conversation.

capabilities.title: Code Assistant
capabilities.subtitle: Write & debug code
capabilities.description: Get help with programming and debugging
capabilities.helpText: Get help writing, debugging, or understanding code.

capabilities.title: Web Search
capabilities.subtitle: Search the internet
capabilities.description: Search the web for current information and news
capabilities.helpText: Find current information from the web.

capabilities.title: Deep Research
capabilities.subtitle: Comprehensive analysis
capabilities.description: Research a topic thoroughly using web sources
capabilities.helpText: Get comprehensive research on any topic with sources.

capabilities.title: Generate Image
capabilities.subtitle: AI image creation
capabilities.description: Create images from text descriptions
capabilities.helpText: Create images from descriptions - just describe what you want!

capabilities.title: Logo Designer
capabilities.subtitle: Create logos
capabilities.description: Design professional logos for brands

capabilities.title: Data Analysis
capabilities.subtitle: Analyze data files
capabilities.description: Upload and analyze CSV, Excel, or other data

action.prompt: Analyze this data and provide insights:

capabilities.title: Run Code
capabilities.subtitle: Execute Python code
capabilities.description: Write and execute Python code with results

capabilities.title: Write Email
capabilities.subtitle: Professional emails
capabilities.description: Generate emails with custom tone and content

capabilities.title: Deal Workflow
capabilities.subtitle: Investment process
capabilities.description: Navigate through deal stages with guided prompts

prompts.title: Market Overview
prompts.prompt: Provide a market overview for {{industry | text:placeholder="Industry name":required}} including key players, market size, and growth trends.

prompts.title: Company Search
prompts.prompt: Find potential acquisition targets in {{sector | text:placeholder="Sector":required}} with revenue between {{min_rev | text:placeholder="Min revenue"}} and {{max_rev | text:placeholder="Max revenue"}}.

prompts.title: Initial Screening
prompts.prompt: Create an initial screening checklist for evaluating {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} as a potential investment.

prompts.title: Financial Analysis
prompts.prompt: Analyze the financial statements of {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}}. Focus on revenue trends, margins, and cash flow.

prompts.title: Risk Assessment
prompts.prompt: Identify key risks and red flags for investing in {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} in the {{industry | text:placeholder="Industry":required}} sector.

prompts.title: Management Review
prompts.prompt: Evaluate the management team of {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} including background, track record, and alignment.

prompts.title: DD Checklist
prompts.prompt: Generate a comprehensive due diligence checklist for {{deal_type | select:options=["Acquisition","Minority Investment","Joint Venture"]:required}}.

prompts.title: Customer Analysis
prompts.prompt: Analyze the customer base of {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} including concentration, retention, and growth trends.

prompts.title: Legal Review
prompts.prompt: Outline key legal due diligence items to review for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} including contracts, IP, and litigation.

prompts.title: Comparable Analysis
prompts.prompt: Find comparable companies and transactions for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} in {{industry | text:placeholder="Industry":required}}.

prompts.title: DCF Model
prompts.prompt: Outline a DCF valuation approach for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} with key assumptions to consider.

prompts.title: Valuation Summary
prompts.prompt: Create a valuation summary comparing different methodologies for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}}.

prompts.title: Term Sheet Review
prompts.prompt:
Review and analyze this term sheet for key terms, risks, and negotiation points:

{{terms | textarea:placeholder="Paste term sheet content...":required}}

prompts.title: Negotiation Strategy
prompts.prompt: Develop a negotiation strategy for acquiring {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} at a target valuation of {{target | text:placeholder="Target valuation":required}}.

prompts.title: Counter Proposal
prompts.prompt: Draft talking points for a counter proposal on {{issue | text:placeholder="Key issue":required}}.

prompts.title: Closing Checklist
prompts.prompt: Generate a closing checklist for the {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} transaction.

prompts.title: Integration Plan
prompts.prompt: Create a 100-day integration plan for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} post-acquisition.

prompts.title: Announcement Draft
prompts.prompt: Draft a press release announcing the acquisition of {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}}.

capabilities.title: Workspace
capabilities.subtitle: Models & tools
capabilities.description: Manage your models, prompts, and tools

capabilities.title: IC Approval
capabilities.subtitle: Committee review
capabilities.description: Investment Committee approval workflow

prompts.title: IC Memo Draft
prompts.prompt: Draft an Investment Committee memo for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} covering investment thesis, key risks, and proposed terms.

prompts.title: Risk Summary
prompts.prompt: Summarize the top 5 risks for the {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} investment and proposed mitigants.

prompts.title: Comparable Deals
prompts.prompt: Find comparable transactions to {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} in {{sector | text:placeholder="Sector":required}} from the past 3 years.

prompts.title: Investment Thesis
prompts.prompt: Articulate the investment thesis for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} including value creation levers.

prompts.title: Market Analysis
prompts.prompt: Provide a market analysis for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} including TAM, competition, and trends.

prompts.title: Slide Outline
prompts.prompt: Create an outline for an IC presentation deck for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} investment.

prompts.title: Executive Summary
prompts.prompt: Write a 1-page executive summary for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} suitable for IC review.

prompts.title: Q&A Prep
prompts.prompt: Generate likely IC questions and suggested answers for the {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} investment.

prompts.title: Meeting Agenda
prompts.prompt: Create an IC meeting agenda for reviewing {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}}.

prompts.title: Discussion Points
prompts.prompt: List key discussion points and decision items for the {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} IC meeting.

prompts.title: IC Decision Summary
prompts.prompt: Draft an IC decision summary for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}} with outcome: {{outcome | select:options=["Approved","Approved with Conditions","Declined","Deferred"]:required}}.

prompts.title: Next Steps
prompts.prompt: Outline next steps following IC {{outcome | select:options=["approval","conditional approval","deferral"]:required}} for {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}}.

prompts.title: Stakeholder Update
prompts.prompt: Draft a stakeholder update email regarding the IC decision on {{company | text:placeholder="Company name":required}}.

capabilities.title: Month-End Close
capabilities.subtitle: Finance workflow
capabilities.description: End of month financial close process

prompts.title: Bank Rec Checklist
prompts.prompt: Generate a bank reconciliation checklist for {{month | text:placeholder="Month/Year":required}}.

prompts.title: Intercompany Rec
prompts.prompt: Create an intercompany reconciliation template for entities: {{entities | textarea:placeholder="List entities..."}}

prompts.title: AR Aging Analysis
prompts.prompt: Analyze accounts receivable aging and suggest collection priorities for balances over {{days | select:options=["30 days","60 days","90 days"]:default="60 days"}}.

prompts.title: Accrual Review
prompts.prompt: List standard month-end accruals to review for {{department | text:placeholder="Department":required}}.

prompts.title: Bonus Accrual
prompts.prompt: Calculate bonus accrual estimate based on {{performance | select:options=["Below Target","At Target","Above Target"]:default="At Target"}} performance.

prompts.title: Expense Accruals
prompts.prompt: Generate expense accrual entries for {{category | select:options=["Professional Services","Marketing","Travel","Utilities","Other"]:required}}.

prompts.title: Variance Analysis
prompts.prompt: Create a variance analysis template comparing actuals to budget for {{month | text:placeholder="Month":required}}.

prompts.title: Management Report
prompts.prompt: Draft a management report summary for {{month | text:placeholder="Month":required}} financial results.

prompts.title: KPI Dashboard
prompts.prompt: List key financial KPIs to include in the monthly dashboard for {{audience | select:options=["Executive Team","Board","Department Heads"]:default="Executive Team"}}.

prompts.title: Close Checklist
prompts.prompt: Generate a month-end close checklist with sign-off tracking for {{month | text:placeholder="Month/Year":required}}.

prompts.title: Journal Entry Review
prompts.prompt: Create a journal entry review template for manual entries over {{threshold | text:placeholder="$10,000"}}.

capabilities.title: Meeting Notes
capabilities.subtitle: Summarize meetings
capabilities.description: Generate structured meeting notes and action items

capabilities.title: Contract Review
capabilities.subtitle: Analyze contracts
capabilities.description: Review contracts and highlight key terms

capabilities.title: Competitor Intel
capabilities.subtitle: Market research
capabilities.description: Research and analyze competitors

capabilities.title: Presentation
capabilities.subtitle: Create outlines
capabilities.description: Generate presentation outlines and talking points

capabilities.title: SQL Assistant
capabilities.subtitle: Write SQL queries
capabilities.description: Generate and optimize SQL queries

capabilities.title: API Documentation
capabilities.subtitle: Document APIs
capabilities.description: Generate API documentation from code or specs

action.prompt: Generate API documentation for the following endpoint or code:

capabilities.title: Weekly Report
capabilities.subtitle: Status updates
capabilities.description: Generate weekly status reports

capabilities.title: Knowledge Base
capabilities.subtitle: Internal docs
capabilities.description: Search internal documentation and wikis

capabilities.title: HR Portal
capabilities.subtitle: Employee resources
capabilities.description: Access HR policies and employee services
